text: Is anyone here familiar with Nix/Guix? I'm trying to better understand the difference in approaches taking by Nix/Guix and BinaryBuilder, especially in the context of (1) patching binaries and (2) the handling of machine-specific libs like libGL.

elements.text: Is anyone here familiar with Nix/Guix? I'm trying to better understand the difference in approaches taking by Nix/Guix and BinaryBuilder, especially in the context of (1) patching binaries and (2) the handling of machine-specific libs like libGL.
